title: Rare Pappy Van Winkle collection being raffled off for a good cause
body: LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) - You can help raise money for Lexington Habitat for Humanity.The organization is raffling off a rare collection of Pappy Van Winkle.All you have to do is buy a raffle ticket.They’re on sale now for $100 each.Tickets are limited, only a thousand are available.The drawing is on May 3.
